title: Lynda - Up and Running with Muse
description: Meet Muse, the design-friendly tool that allows anyone familiar with programs like Photoshop or InDesign to create rich, HTML-based websitesÃ¢â‚¬â€even if you don't have a strong grasp on coding. James Fritz is your guide on this brief tour. He'll show you how to set up webpages, and add multimedia and interactive features like menus, slideshows, and maps. He'll also demonstrate how easy it is to export your site and publish it to the web. With all these skills in hand, you can go ahead and concentrate on the design; Muse will take care of the rest.
